website_summaries.verdict: If you can deal with a straight razor, this is a great choice for those wanting the closest shave possible.
pros: If you can handle a straight razor, you will get the closest shave you can imagine
Plenty of blades come with the unit, too
cons: There is a big risk of cutting yourself with this unless you know what you are doing

website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek the straight razor experience with the convenience of disposable blades, this affordable shavette is an excellent choice.
pros: Blades are extremely sharp, so only requires light shaving touch
Affordable alternative to high end models
Disposable blades do not require honing
cons: Removing and changing blades can be challenging
Handle is flimsy, not easy to control shave
Rusting and pitting have been reported

customer_reviews.title: If your broke af, buy this.
customer_reviews.text: With 100 blades good for 3-4 shaves and it's like $4 for another 100 kits like this you'll never need another razor for YEARS. Of course you better know how to handle them. Dollar shave club is great bang for buck too. But this kit you'll save crazy stupid money. Also my gf likes me to shave her legs sometimes with it. Pretty sure the danger turns her on.
customer_reviews.author: Ortron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cuts almost as good as my exes knife in my back.. update and is as rusty as her heart. you gotta dry this thing of around the pins an the clasp the holds the blade.
customer_reviews.author: iguy

customer_reviews.title: Blades are OKUURRRT!
customer_reviews.text: It came on time, blades are sharp, I used it for my legs with the Tomb 45 shave gel and let me tell you honey legs are more smooth than butter. I then went on to derma planing on my face with a new blade and it was amazing, my face got a glow. I like that after I did my legs with this blade my legs feel better than when I shave with a razor.
customer_reviews.author: Briana T.

customer_reviews.title: Yeah.....no...
customer_reviews.text: Well, consider me a “one-and-done” in the straight razor world. Glad I had a styptic pen handy to stop the bleeding. Barely finished one side of my face and gave up. As for the razor itself, the major flaw with it is that the back end of it is disproportionate to the business end. Meaning that even when holding it with the proper grip as shown in pics and videos, the weight of the back end causes the shaver to turn in your hand, altering the shave angle and blade position. Going back to my 3 blade safety razor I have from my mail order company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blades fall out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college age son for Christmas. He says the blades won't stay in! He sent me a video clip showing how easily they fall out. The blade holder appears to be tight at one end but is too loose at the other to hold the blades tight. I wanted to return it but Amazon says it's not eligible. 😟 (Also, I was going to post a picture but the app won't allow me to?)
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the face and more
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for dermaplaning. I have been doing it on myself for years before it was a popular procedure. I usually bought the straight blades from Sally’s, but they are more expensive. These are so inexpensive I am able to use a new blade every single time. Very easy to get the blade in. I used it the first time right when this came quickly in the mail. I can’t imagine I’ll need to purchase another product for this purpose for a long time. I also use it to trim my fiancé’s neck line in between haircuts. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Straight and easy
customer_reviews.text: I am still using this to shave my beard since I consider myself a beginner still it gives me a very clean shave and the ability to line it up nice and clean just remember it is a straight razor and if you’re not careful you can still cut yourself badly
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brown

customer_reviews.title: I made it out alive
customer_reviews.text: As a first-time straight razor user I expected the worst and hope for the best. To my surprise no next and I got a close shave
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, besides cutting myself quite a few times it does a really good job and it has a ton of replacement blades.
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: For everyone talking about rust
customer_reviews.text: I've had my equinox straight razor for 2 yrs and first I'd like to say it's an excellent straight razor second after each use I rinse my handle then I wipe it off with a paper towel or a towel and that's what makes the difference if you just use your razor and you just throw it back on the rack wet then you might have a possibility of some rust, but besides that it just doesn't instantly rust from a little water getting on it it's quite resistant you just have to take care of it and go the little extra step of wiping your equipment off when you finish with it.
customer_reviews.author: The exsposer Chris

customer_reviews.title: It easily came off the box but I didn't think much ...
customer_reviews.text: Received a used razor with scratches and obvious signs of use. It easily came off the box but I didn't think much of it however when I noticed the water marks and many scratches everywhere I knew there was something wrong. I hate to receive it this way since it was intended to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Razor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent razor weight, surgical steel, quick delivery also a box of Derby blades. Brand I never used, not bad, sharp! I use that razor everyday al day, the weight allows you to let it shave by itself..
customer_reviews.author: gtb386

customer_reviews.title: Amazon customer service representative attitude
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as described by the seller.. Blade arms Don't slide apart enough to put the blade in or take out with out getting cut.. once the blade is in their is hardly enough blade edge to shave with.. The Blades are like tin foil.. there is no way to contact seller.. Spoke to a Suman from Amazon customer service who was very unprofessional in his Remarks.. I have shop with Amazon over 15 yrs. But this order has made me think Walmart is a better place and customer service representative..
customer_reviews.author: JRBASE

customer_reviews.title: Better study up before using
customer_reviews.text: This straight razor is very nice. Seems well made and it's easy to load with the blade. Now using a straight razor is all romantic and what not but it's no joke. Watch You tube or get with a barber to learn how to use this. Especially if you plan on using it n yourself you need to practice. This straight razor came with a pack of 100 blades that fit like a glove. I used it man they are sharp. The razor cleans very easily with warm water and tissue. I would also recommend using a facial oil and cleaning your face with hot water prior to using the razor. Great product. I recommend but use with practice.
customer_reviews.author: PANIRUD

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE AND IT CUTS INTO YOUR SKIN
customer_reviews.text: THIS BLADE CUT INTO MY SKIN Horrible product what a waste of $10 BE CAREFUL THIS PRODUCT IS NOT RETURNABLE! I can see why they won’t let me return this. They know it doesn’t work. I got cut as soon as I tried to line myself up. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Giant

customer_reviews.title: Basic straight edge razor, nice value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice razor in a disposable plastic packaging. My husband has been wanting a straight-edge razor to clean up the lines on his beard. I'll update when I know how well lit works. As far as packaging, and the value of what's included, I'm giving it five stars. Seems to be a very basic straight razor, no bells and whistles but that's what I wanted to get him to start out with in case he ends up not liking it (as he tends to do). Make sure that you keep these blades out of reach of any children though...
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Solid Buy
customer_reviews.text: Not a one piece, and you'll continually have to buy new blades for it, but it's definitely a great starter razor. I would love to spend $200 on a straight blade, but that's a lot to commit to an experience that could end your desire to learn how to straight edge your face. Plus, the blades ensure that you're always going to be cutting with a consistent sharpness. For the price, definitely something worth purchasing if you're looking in to getting in to the straight razor game.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob lee c

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recomend even for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky and the blade is wayyyy too small and little, wouldnt recommend, cant really see where you're at because its bulk and the the razors are tiney, you can't barely seee where the razor is really at. Too complicated and not effective enough, design is very good for cleaning except the metle thing holding it together.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Alba

customer_reviews.title: very very poor quilty despite the paid reviews say
customer_reviews.text: i bought this SR thinking it be good with high score but come to find out its very cheaply made and less then a month its already rusting badly, with no return option im pissed, and also they made the thing so slippery for when u use it your fingers slide to much cause u to cute ur self to easily. theres zero groves for your fingers to hold them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Takes practice
customer_reviews.text: I cut myself the first time twice pretty good but then learned you need to always keep the blade angle at 30 degrees. The spine or blade holder is a good width guide. You should only have about the width of the spine from your surface (face in my case). Smooth short strokes rinse blade and re-soap often. Very sharp so be careful but and practice with a days growth to get proficient. Good product very clean look. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Knight

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Please be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: The product is packages nicely, has a good weight, and does the job well. However, this is not for the inexperienced. Sharp objects cut people, this product is extremely sharp and not to be messed around with. I cut my self 2 times in my first 2 uses.Both cuts happened on my hand when I pulled the razor away from my face and down by my stomach to look at my shave in the mirror. IF YOU TAKE THE BLAD AWAY FROM YOUR FACE, CLOSE IT IMMEDIATELY. Overall, good product, but very sharp and dangerous. I would recommend, but please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a straight razor in many a year and bought this shavette to even the borders of my beard. The razor is reasonably put together. The blade securing mechanism is okay but I find that the alignment changes with use. The blades that come with it are functional though bit too grabby for my tastes. I think this shavette will hold any double edge blade snapped in two. For the price you can't go wrong. Would I buy another? I suspect this razor will last for a while but should the need to replace it arise I will probably investigate other options.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: stylish & perfect height
customer_reviews.text: The fit was a great guess for me and fit perfect! very stylish and comfortable. I don't usually wear heels so this was a good height and I was able to wear it all day. Purchased this shoe for a wedding and did I get compliments :) so much so before the night was over I nearly had to give it away so many people asked for it. I'm very happy to have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chingling

customer_reviews.title: Gets those hard to reach spots.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to shave my spouse's head and face. Still working the kinks out in my technique. Did it for the 3rd time today. Going to replace the blade before shaving with and across the grain and again to go against the grain. Next time. Got some nicks when using the blade a second time, but smooth sailing with a fresh blade. He has a skin crease in the back of his head that I could never get before this.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Durable quality with great blades
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of razors! The quality really is superb and the simplicity to the product is great. Comes with adequate instructions and ~100 razors that will last a really long time depending on how often you shave. The handle is comfortable and not too heavy at all. The only bothersome part about the process is the reloading of the razor. It could be difficult or frustrating for some because the blade often slips off before you can put the "blade-lock" on. The razors are thin and sharp as hell which makes a great clean/smooth shave. Make sure to change your razor blade every 3 or 4 shaving sessions if you want to always get a smooth one-stroke shave.
customer_reviews.author: Etevez

customer_reviews.title: This was my first straight razor
customer_reviews.text: I really don't have much to compare it to because this was my first straight razor. I have used this razor several times now and I find it easy to use and fashionable. I like the fact that you remove and replace the razors rather then reusing the same one over and over again. I feel like that would be bad for your skin and the razor. Not to mention having to sharpen the razor all the time. I know this is probably really bad for the environment...but it gets such a nice clean shave!!
customer_reviews.author: Guadz

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: First time straight razor user so I didn't want to invest a lot in a razor. This fit the bill perfectly. It's a well made razor and came with 100 blades which will last me a long time. I don't plan to use it every day, but it is an interesting throwback process. I'd recommend this to anyone who needs a razor with replaceable blades and does not want to invest a lot of money in it. I'm completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Swander

customer_reviews.title: but will say I really like this razor
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the world of straight edge razors, but will say I really like this razor. I use it mainly for trimming around my beard. I like the changeable blades so that I don't have to spend time sharpening the razor. It feels good in the hands, and there is a sense of nostalgia that makes this razor fun to use. A fair warning, it does take some getting use to, but once you get the hang of it you should get a good shave/trim without nicks and cuts.
customer_reviews.author: phlop45

customer_reviews.title: The build quality and the feel of this razor is great. Don’t be afraid to try it out.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while now and I must say this is by far the best I’ve had. It is easy to hold and easy to use. They included one hundred blades with the razor and that’s great. The build quality is A one. I decided to write my review later just to varify that it is stainless steel and I can assure you I’ve had this for months, I have not seen it change color or does it scratch easily . For me 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Damionz Allembert

customer_reviews.title: Not going back
customer_reviews.text: This razor is fantastic. I get a very close shave, and can now get away with shaving every third day or so. It takes a couple times to get comfortable, and it's nearly a guarantee that you'll nick yourself a few times, but once you get the hang of it, theres no going back. Also, the replacement blades for it cost about $8 for a pack of 100. Shaving every third day with the occasional day off means that I get a Year's worth of new blades for $8.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: a great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: after the gillet ran its BS commercial against men and how being WOKE is great. I quit using gillet's product. Now I was inspired to learn how to use a straight razor. I view this as a great cheap way to start that journey For the money its a great product compared to the price of Gillet's Razor handle and a 5 pack of razors. I have no complaints other than the steep learning curve to using a straight razor blade
customer_reviews.author: Justin G

customer_reviews.title: I hate doing low stars if it could be user error ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate doing low stars if it could be user error but after reading some reviews, I thought this would be a bit better. I have a steady hand and have watched the youtube videos... that should be enough, right? Frankly, I just think that for facial shaving it needs to be a straight edge razor with greater length but who am I to say. Seemed decently made but, since I will probably never use it again (after repeatedly cutting myself), I can't really give it better than 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Titus Onderdonck

customer_reviews.title: Equinox Professional Straight Edge Razor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Equinox Professional Straight Edge Razor for my husband because he wanted to use for his beard. He watch the tutorial on how to use and yes he nknicked himself but he quickly realize what he did wrong. He loves it and there is a difference betwen using this and clippers. This staright razor leaves a muck BETTER feel on the face.
customer_reviews.author: DFL

customer_reviews.title: Straight Edge Razor
customer_reviews.text: This is my first straight razor. I wanted something I could use between haircuts at my local barber to just touch up my straight part and my beard line. Since Ive never used one it took me a few times to get it down and not be afraid of cutting myself but I got it down and it does a great job. Price was unbeatable! Quality IMO is great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT RAZOR AND BLADES FOR A CRAZY LOW PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use straight blade shavers. But my brother does; and this is one of his favorite sets of blades and shaver. Don’t have any idea what brand of foam or lotion he prefers; but I have given him this super low priced gift several times. He has a lot of cool shavers, but I know that this razor and its sharp blades will give you great results for a very excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Major T.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH AS A BABY'S BOTTOM
customer_reviews.text: Smooth as a baby's bottom, describes the shave I can now have every day. The razor glides by itself down my face. Excellent razor, well balanced to hold securely in hand. Slow and steady is the path to achieve that barbershop quality. Well worth the investment, I do not need to purchase a strop for the edge, five to six shaves per blade. Brings me to a time when Men were Men.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper1953

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good product. Shipped very quickly and came as described
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good product. Shipped very quickly and came as described. It truly is easy to use for beginners like myself. It was my first shave with a straight edge razor and it went without a hitch. No nicks no cuts. At the end of my shave I recreated the scene from Gangs of New York and slashed my cheek. "The blood stays on the blade. One day you'll understand." One thing that people might like to know is that my razor came with some scratches. I don't mind but I want to let people know that there were visible scratches all over the thing. It still performed well. I look forward to using this more often.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Best Shave Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've shaved with straight edge razors before. All I could find though were cheaper models. Equinox is on the professional level. The kind of shave I get at my barber. If you know what your are doing, you can go 2 to 3 days with a good shave. If you're shaving with plastic disposables or electric shavers, you don't know what you're missing. Try it, take your time, see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used so far. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle. Very sturdy and easy to replace the blade. Feels good in your hand. It actually feels as though the blades are more sharper somehow. Blade stays firmly in place, zero movement. I strongly recommend. It comes with a pack of blades too. Can't beat this deal. If you find something better, slap yourself because you're lying.
customer_reviews.author: Band of the Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to always have a sharp blade
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I also have one I have to sharpen. This one is so much better. It is easy to change the blades. Blades shave incredibly close. Just take your time until you get the hang of it. Or you will probably cut yourself a few times. The only thing I don't like about this product is that it does show the rust very easily. Even if you just have it by the shower. You can dry it off. And if anyone takes a hot steamy shower. You will notice rust spots when you change the blades.
customer_reviews.author: B. E

customer_reviews.title: Decent straight edge razor
customer_reviews.text: The straight edge razor is nice but I really don't know how to use it. I've been looking on Youtube and reading the instructions but I'm not getting the most out of the razor. I'm a new user to using straight edge razors so my ineffectiveness could be my lack of experience using a straight edge razor.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Its well-built (in terms of feeling heavy and solid) but it will not hold blades straight. It's hard to put new blades in because this straight razor does not grab them tight enough. Blades tend to slide around-this causes an unbelievable amount if nicks and scratches. I've tried it for a month and I'm over it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners trying out straight shaving
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for such a product. The 100 blades it comes with gives you great opportunity to practice before upgrading. Though would probably be a great razor to keep for a long time or for traveling. Make sure to wipe dry after use or can develop some rust stains The amount of blades given should last almost a year. (1 blade = ~2 uses)
customer_reviews.author: Ilya

customer_reviews.title: Its a good peice
customer_reviews.text: Its good Quality good weight it’s good on the hand it’s worth the purchase but if you were not skilled with your hands do not buy this because you will not have a good time trying to cut and learn it takes a lot of time for a normal person to figure out the best way to use this
customer_reviews.author: ricky salazar

customer_reviews.title: Smooth to handle
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is good for the razor itself and box of derby blades. Nothing opened up even though the packaging is easy to open so it's great everything stayed unopened. There's some weight to the handle and it helps with the wrist movement to get a close shave which I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Martinez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite razor
customer_reviews.text: Very good shaver. Takes getting used to, but when you do, it’s awesome. Just make sure to use tomb45 shave gel with it. You can use cream but you can’t get precise cuts cuz ya can’t see, goofy! Trust me... gel... works. You will get razor burn at first without it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Olympia

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great for the price. It contains plenty of razors, and is very sturdy. The only thing that isn't quite user friendly is the instructions of how to actually insert the blade. I had to look up a youtube video tutorial. Other than that, highly recommended for those areas that require a bit more precision.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lykins

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The razor and blades are a really good value, I've had it for 6 months now and am happy with my purchase. I haven't had any rust or any problems with it.The only problem is that i'm still cutting myself every time, but that could be because I have sensitive skin. I prefer to use this only for aligning my beard and using a safety razor for regular shaving. Either way this is a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Asad Kazi

customer_reviews.title: Really good razor
customer_reviews.text: Primarily used to edge up the sides of my temple. Instructions were clear and it was easy to ensemble. The only thing, it would have been nice to be able to place the razor a little higher so that it is protruding more. I learned this trick from my barber but I could not do it with this straight edge. Overall it does the job. Good price for the value.
customer_reviews.author: K. B

customer_reviews.title: Great  quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Well, as my very first experience with a straight razor I have to say I rather like this. Does a great job getting close to my skin, easy enough to change the blades, and seems pretty sturdy. Only issue I have is that the hinge point seems to be riveted together which makes the opening and closing difficult for the first few hundred goes. But I guess that's to keep the handle in place while in use. I'm not sure. Just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Your Buck, but Blade Moves.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's a heck of a straight edge. I'm hoping that the stainless steel is truly a quality grade. We'll see in a few months. I did notice however that the blade exposure does not stay evenly exposed throughout a shave. The blade sometimes falls flush with blade guard rendering the shavers useless until you readjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Domenic Tavella

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It may not be the fanciest thing out there, but I bought this to just get me through barber school thinking I would buy something much better once I graduated. Actually, I fell in love with it. It's super easy to use and very durable. The weight is perfect for me and I will use it until it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good balance and weight
customer_reviews.text: Good balance and weight. A bit of a pain to separate at first, but it will gradually become easier after a few times. Use your finger nail to pry the leaves open. Don't forget to separate the parts, remove the razor, and dry the parts off. Apply a little bit of oil too (or just a shot of a water disperser like WD40 and be done). It WILL rust if you don't
customer_reviews.author: Melnibonean

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, make sure you know what you’re doing.
customer_reviews.text: The product is solid, great design, love the classic style with the modern materials(got the metal one) Razors are super sharp, easy to handle if you know what you’re doing. Cons: the blade isn’t tied enough so it’ll move a bit, very DANGEROUS!! It might be just mine that came defective but just keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac M.

customer_reviews.title: First time straight razor user
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I shave irregularly and can't use the multi-blade safety razors on heavy growth / beards because they terminally clog. Works much better than I expected. Design and weight seem spot on. My technique is a work in progress. Makes me wish I had tried a straight razor sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Xeno

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean hair lines. Great for first timers.
customer_reviews.text: Have cut my own hair for over 20 years now and am happy to add this to my kit. Easy to use and my first straight edge. After several youtube videos and practing the movements without a blade installed, I am super happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sharp if you don't know how to use it be careful I tried myself and thought I did good until I was finished and leaking all over my bathroom sink it's so sharp I had no idea I cut myself definitely not for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Vincent buono

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: I use Equinox Professional Straight Edge Razor for all my grooming. It's perfect for my eyebrows and keeps my hairline crisp. Super simple to set up and use too. You really can't beat the deal of a straight edge PLUS 100 razors. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for that perfect trim, line up, and or cut every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My smoothest legs ever, but blades wear out & tough to install
customer_reviews.text: The blades are difficult to install and don't last very long, but do provide the closest shave I've ever had in my life. If you're also planning on using this for legs and/or armpits I recommend searching YouTube, there are some stellar tutorials on how to use a straight razor there. Bikini area shaving... I don't recommend with a straight razor. My good old double-headed is my friend there.
customer_reviews.author: Kassi Dephinia

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and learn before you try
customer_reviews.text: It's the first and only straight razor I've used. The product seems well built. It is solid metal. The blades also seem to be fine. They're good for about 3 shaves. Just be VERY careful and watch tutorials if you've never shaved with one. My first try was the most painful night of my life. I had razor burn worse than I ever thought was possible. I went to bed with ice packs on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: great shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have several straight edge razers. This is by far my favorite of the "low cost" razers I use. The way it holds the blades, how it feels in my hand, and the weight of it all make it very easy to use. would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Mart

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold blade
customer_reviews.text: This may be all metal, but it is clearly very cheaply machined, and it really looks pretty bad. My main problem is that the blade holder does not adequately pinch the blade in place. I place the blade in and close the retention arm as the instructions show, and flip it over to use and the blade falls out. this is my second straight razor with this problem make sure to buy from a reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: good for first time
customer_reviews.text: easy to use worth for the price. just takes some time to get the blade in the holder but locks in firmly and holds. for learning how to use a straight razor this is worth the price instead of spending $50 on a premium straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: moonboi

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a plastic container, not a box.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice straight razor I bought as a gift. The only thing I was slightly upset about was the fact it comes in a cheap plastic container instead of a box. Which makes it more difficult to wrap. But I know it helps keep the cost low.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan n chad

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Way Too Much.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is pretty low quality. I'm no expert on shaving, but it seems like it cuts my face way too much. I bought it to straighten out the lines of my beard, which if I used a regular razor, usually is pretty imprecise.
customer_reviews.author: T_Dog_G

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I only bought to clean my edge up and line up my goatee every couple of days and it does the job, can’t complain. It has been sturdy and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners... I learned from this one. I now have the Feather SS Japanese style.
customer_reviews.author: CashCarver

customer_reviews.title: this is by far my favorite. I've used the most expensive ones money can ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that after using straight edge razors for over 20 years, this is by far my favorite. I've used the most expensive ones money can buy, but this is my go to always. The weight and balance of the razor allows for smooth shaving without the nicks and cuts. If you ever need to start off with a straight razor, then this one is highly recommended. You will not regret it. Keep up the great work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob L.

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: You will cut yourself with this! It is NOT for beginners. It is not rounded on the blades so it will cut you when you least expect it even when being careful! Get a blade that needs sharpening, not a replaceable blade.
customer_reviews.author: Hiral

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This straight edge razor is nice and heavy I like that it comes with a lot of blades. Best blade I've had and I owned quite a few. Just like with any sharp object be extremely careful when loading the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaldo Caraballo

customer_reviews.title: Good Razor
customer_reviews.text: The razor itself is pretty good and fairly simple to use. Mine did develop a few rust spots even though it was dried and wiped after using. The blades only last me maybe 2 shaves max before I have to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Rodo

customer_reviews.title: great straight edge blade
customer_reviews.text: only complaint i have is that it is a bit short compared to many straight edge blades i have used over the years. so it is a bit awkward and uncomfortable to hold but you get use to it. i love the weight of the full metal body.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Younes

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend. He has the whole mustache/ goatee thing going on and has been wanting one for a while. He is a beginner and is still learning, so maneuvering it is a bit difficult just because of the way everything sets once its fully extended. But all in all he's happy with it and gets a lot of complements.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F

customer_reviews.title: Great price but that's where it ends
customer_reviews.text: Good starter shavette. I find the pins that hold the blade too be too short (makes it difficult to align the blade when you lock everything together) and the scales to be too heavy (makes it difficult to control the blade angle). It seems well-made and you cant beat the price. For what you'd pay for 100 blades, you're basically getting the razor for free. As someone who has used Parker, Sanguine and Facon shavettes, I find all those to be better than this one, although all those cost 2x or 3x as much.
customer_reviews.author: Badgerstate

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great straight razor for beginners. Not to hard to use and get used to, fact that it comes with 100 replacements blades as well makes it a definite for those interested in shaving with a straight razor
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Peefect little shavette!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars!-yes five stars this is a perfect little shavette nice heft ! nice length! holds blade well, no plastic bits!! good free blade , great price! I got no nicks , no tugs , no pulls , no scrapes no razor burn - thats a question of technique and there is a learning curve you tube can help buy it ! you'll thank me later!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Esquilin

customer_reviews.title: Tried to love it so much but just couldn't get my self ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried to love it so much but just couldn't get my self to use this. It does not go with my beard liner because the edge is a little further down. holding it was awkward too. I just wasted money and am also out of my return window.
customer_reviews.author: BaHaD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say this product is for beginners as it is a razor and my husband, having switched from a solid blade to these replaceable blades, cuts himself if he is not extremely careful, but non the less it is a great product that holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McLain

customer_reviews.title: A Solid, Practical Choice for Straight Razor Beginners (like me)
customer_reviews.text: You really can't go wrong at this price, w/ 100 spare blades! Easy to load and use out of the box, and the unit feels sturdy and safe in my hands. I haven't used it on my face yet, but it works very well on arms and legs (dry run).
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for beginners, you’ll slice your face off. The design works and it’s pretty easy to use and clean. The blades are cheap and long lasting. Definitely recommend, if you don’t mind taking your time.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Anderson

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a man who wants to shape his own facial hair. Very sharp. I’ve cut myself a number of times, but it had nothing to with the the razor but more to do with my lack of experience haha
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp blades providing a close shave
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my ex boyfriend when I was with him and he liked the close shave he was able to get with these. It seems like he nipped himself a little bit in the beginning because they’re so sharp, but he quickly became a pro and learned the right pressures and angles to go at.
customer_reviews.author: Akilam

customer_reviews.title: Best shave ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best shave ever! You'll cut yourself a few times learning how to use a straight razor, but it's worth it. You'll never get as closea shave as you will with this. Be aware you need to change the blade ever use or it will be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for precision.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Such precision and the blades are so nice and sharp. It feels great in my hands when I'm completing my husband's lineup. It works at any angle and it really works well on coarse hair in any direction. It's definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it !
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have anything negative to say about this product it works really good for what I use it for. This was the 1st time I buy a straight edge razor and it works perfectly. Although it is very sharp so you do have to be careful with it and It also comes with additional blades. It’s not so stiff I’ve been having it for 2 months and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: I started out like Sweeny Todd and am getting better with every shave!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, perfect tool for beginners. I've never used a straight razor before and it's been an enjoyable, often hilarious, adventure. The Equinox PSER is a well balanced razor, fits well in my hands (large), and handles easily. I need lots of practice to shave against the grain!
customer_reviews.author: FCEtier

customer_reviews.title: Generic Shavette
customer_reviews.text: First time shaving with a shavette. Cut my face up twice and got some nasty razor burn (but I think that's more because of the cremo shave cream I used). Honestly, not a difficult as I thought it would be though. This is an adequate razor, but I think any other cheap shavette would do the same job, so I would suggest getting one you think looks the nicest.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Love this straight razor Equinox is dope!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent straight razor with style and finesse. Small but packs a punch it is also really smooth to work with. From lining up adults to cleaning up children it is really safe to use. Not just that but cleaning and sanitizing is so much easier from the split away latch. I would recommend any begginer to all professionals to try this straight razor out you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonham Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It is not easy to use if you are not familiar with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This came exactly as described and seems much more heavy duty than I was expecting. I use a DE and only use this for touch ups because it it more precise than a DE. It is not easy to use if you are not familiar with a straight edge, so go slowly and be very careful when learning to use. I was confused at how to load the blade until I saw a video online, the blade holder actually separates and can swing open and closed to load the blade.
customer_reviews.author: H. Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing razor for a very good price
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a straight razor before I bought this one and honestly I'm never going back to my Gillette razor. I got the cleanest shave of my life with this one it's so sharp and it even feels amazing to shave with! Kinda complicated on how to hold it at first but you learn quick. So definitely a 5 star from me, great price for what all it includes, I would spend alot more if I had to buy another one just like this one. But this one is pretty sturdy so that's unlikely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Beginner Shavette
customer_reviews.text: The shavette is very sturdy and feels solidly built. It has a nice heft in your hands and it does not feel like it will slip. There is definite tension on the pivot joint which makes it feel secure and like it will not slip when you are shaving. It holds the arm in place so you can adjust the angle without worry. The mechanism that holds the blade is a little tricky, but not terribly hard to use. The blade feels secure when it is locked in.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, very proffesional. The blades are in good condition, very sharp. The razor it's a bit cluncky in the beginning, but you can fix that with some lubing oil that you use in lubing your beard trimming machine.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: At first it worked Ok. After a couple of months of almost daily use, the two sides that meet together to hold the razor started to get loose. The razor would be moveable, and now one side sticks out more than the other. So I can shave my left side perfectly but my right side is like using a dull blade.
customer_reviews.author: Ali A

customer_reviews.title: Just not good
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I realized that. However, I saw great reviews and thought, "well, maybe it IS a good value". NOT. You cannot return this item. This is the first time I was unable to return something from Amazon. Where did this item get these good reviews?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great razor, fast Prime SIX-DAY shipping
customer_reviews.text: I have been shaving with hollow ground 'cut throat' straight razors for years and was intrigued by this product. It gives a very close shave, and it will cut you if you are not careful! It requires a lighter touch than my other razors - I found out the hard way, just charging-on. I've found that a little flatter-to-the-skin angle works really well. I will suggest this to friends who are interested in trying straight shaving.
customer_reviews.author: G-Dub

customer_reviews.title: A must own
customer_reviews.text: Practice practice practice I'm still getting used to it but I got a hundred blades to help me do it great product save yourself some money when you can't make it to the barber.
customer_reviews.author: Belond G Coleman Sr

customer_reviews.title: A Classic For a New Era
customer_reviews.text: A great hybrid tool that utilizes the cutting prowess and edge geometry of a straight razor with the ease of maintenance and upkeep that comes with a disposible razor. Anyone experienced in straight razors can appreciate the versatility and modern comforts that come from a nuanced piece, while a newcomer can appreciate the more gradual learning curve that comes with ownership as well as the accomidations for a faster lifestyle in our modern era.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality blade, great value of razors!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality blade, was a bit hard to open and close but you get used to it, wish it was a bit simpler (slide, instead of 3-piece opening mechanism). Nice value of 100 razors included in package, really cool but must know how to use - ask your barber to show you, to avoid cuts! Do not attempt to figure it out on your own, lest you slice your throat!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice intro to straight shaving.
customer_reviews.text: I initially wanted to join a Spanish street gang but quickly realized it was no longer the 1950's and my life was not a musical. Therefore I switched the intent of the purpose to shaving. For this purpose it has worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: RTM

customer_reviews.title: Not just for shaving and better than hobby knives
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast delivery, packaged very well. However, I'm not using it for shaving, I build wooden model ships and airplanes and needed a very sharp tool to cut out the wood on the various models. This razor works well on the wood and gives great cuts on the "silk span" for covering airplanes.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

product_meta.title: Equinox Professional Straight Edge Razor with 100 Single Edge Derby Blades - Close Shaving Men's Manual Shaver Safety
feature_bullets: CLASSIC: Old is Gold! You don’t need the “latest and greatest” 3-4-5 blade, super expensive, rolling ball razor out in the market these days, to get a fine quality shave. Our great grandfathers were able to remain handsome and smooth, using this classic Straight Edge Razor which is a timeless masterpiece for men’s shaving.

QUALITY: Our razors are made from fine quality Stainless Steel, guaranteed to never rust or tarnish with use. Built with an easy-to-open blade guard, you can exchange each blade safely and effortlessly.

ERGONOMIC: Designed with comfort and stability in mind, the Equinox Professional Straight Edge Razor performs well and provides the right holding angle to avoid discomfort. When opened, your ring finger rests on the back handle loop, index and middle fingers on top, and your thumb near the blade compartment. NOTE: Be sure to gently squeeze the protection cap before closing it to ensure a tight and secure grip so your blade will not fall out.

200+ SHAVES: We have packaged our razor with the best selling blades in the market. Included is a box of 100 Single Edge Blades by Derby which are individually wrapped for safety and hygienic purposes. Each blade can be used for 2-3 shaves, making this Value Pack a great bargain!

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We know you will come to love and enjoy shaving with this classic shaving system just as much as we do. So we offer you to try the Equinox Straight Edge Razor with 100 Blades, for 30-Days risk free. If you are not completely satisfied and loving the close shave this brings, then simply return for your money back.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
